description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 11/30/2006

Ridge shares his concern about his parents’ relationship with Brooke. Brooke tells Ridge about her ideas for a new fashion company. Then Ridge and Brooke make love.  Eric visits Jackie and tells her that he still cares for her. Jackie is deeply moved. Taylor questions Stephanie about her anger, attempting to find a cause for it. Stephanie tenses up when Taylor brings up her mother.  Stephanie recall a memory of her father and then admits that her father hit her.
